attrUUID(address,uint256).details: Generates an identifier which associates a user and a poll together

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll

attrUUID(address,uint256).return: UUID Hash which is deterministic from _user and _pollID

constructor.details: uses the setup function to initialize PLM by specifying the token used for voting

params._tokenAddr: The address of the ERC20 token to be used for voting

params._numTokens: The value for the numTokens attribute in the node to be inserted
params._voter: The voter whose DLL will be searched

getInsertPointForNumTokens(address,uint2.return: the node which the propoded node should be inserted after

getLastNode(address).details: Gets top element of sorted poll-linked-list

params._voter: Address of user to check against

getLastNode(address).return: Integer identifier to poll with maximum number of tokens committed to it

getLockedTokens(address).details: Gets the numTokens property of getLastNode

params._voter: Address of user to check against

getLockedTokens(address).return: Maximum number of tokens committed in poll specified

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll

getNumPassingTokens(address,uint256).return: correctVotes Number of tokens voted for winning option

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll
params._voter: Address of user to check against

getNumTokens(address,uint256).return: Number of tokens committed to poll in sorted poll-linked-list

getTotalNumberOfTokensForWinningOption(u.details: Gets the total winning votes for reward distribution purposes

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll

getTotalNumberOfTokensForWinningOption(u.return: Total number of votes committed to the winning option for specified poll

getVoteChoice(address,uint256).details: Gets the bytes32 voteChoice property of target poll

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll
params._voter: Address of user to check against

getVoteChoice(address,uint256).return: uint vote choice attached to target poll

isExpired(uint256).details: Checks if an expiration date has been reached

params._terminationDate: Integer timestamp of date to compare current timestamp with

isExpired(uint256).return: expired Boolean indication of whether the terminationDate has passed

isPassed(uint256).details: Check if votesFor out of totalVotes exceeds votesQuorum (requires pollEnded)

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll

pollEnded(uint256).details: Checks isExpired for specified poll's revealEndDate
pollEnded(uint256).return: Boolean indication of whether polling period is over

pollExists(uint256).details: Checks if a poll exists, throws if the provided poll is in an impossible state

params._pollID: The pollID whose existance is to be evaluated.

pollExists(uint256).return: Boolean Indicates whether a poll exists for the provided pollID

requestVotingRights(uint256).details: Assumes that msg.sender has approved voting contract to spend on their behalf

params._numTokens: The number of votingTokens desired in exchange for ERC20 tokens

rescueAndWithdraw(uint256[],uint256).details: Rescue tokens from old polls, and then withdraw the designated amount of tokens. This should be called so that the user can withdraw with one transaction

rescueTokens(uint256).details: Unlocks tokens locked in vote where poll has ended

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with the target poll

setup(address).details: initializes the contract by spcifying the token used for voting. Can be called by proxy contracts to initialize their state.

params._tokenAddr: The address of the ERC20 token to be used for voting

startPoll(uint256,uint256).details: Initiates a poll with canonical configured parameters at pollID emitted by PollCreated event

params._voteQuorum: Type of majority (out of 100) that is necessary for poll to be successful
params._votingDuration: Length of voting duration for the challenge poll

validPosition(uint256,uint256,address,ui.details: Compares previous and next poll's committed tokens for sorting purposes

params._nextID: Integer identifier associated with next poll in sorted order
params._numTokens: The number of tokens to be committed towards the poll (used for sorting)
params._prevID: Integer identifier associated with previous poll in sorted order
params._voter: Address of user to check DLL position for

validPosition(uint256,uint256,address,ui.return: valid Boolean indication of if the specified position maintains the sort

params._numTokens: The number of tokens to be committed towards the target poll
params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll
params._prevPollID: The ID of the poll that the user has voted the maximum number of tokens in which is still less than or equal to numTokens
params._voteOption: True if voting yes, false if voting no

votingPeriodActive(uint256).details: Checks isExpired for the specified poll's commitEndDate

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll

votingPeriodActive(uint256).return: Boolean indication of isCommitPeriodActive for target poll

params._numTokens: The number of ERC20 tokens desired in exchange for voting rights

requestVotingRights(uint256).notice: Loads _numTokens ERC20 tokens into the voting contract for one-to-one voting rights

votingPeriodActive(uint256).notice: Checks if the commit period is still active for the specified poll

withdrawVotingRights(uint256).notice: Withdraw _numTokens ERC20 tokens from the voting contract, revoking these voting rights
